attributes.action: increase the tax credits for those with a ''high income''!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £15000 joint income should not be classed as a high income for receiving tax credits. Those who have worked hard all their life are being penalised for having children, were as those who have never paid into the system are given a fortune. Help out the people that have tried to make a go of their lives please!
